name: Eun-byul Selous
profile: Curious, Intelligent, No moral restraint, A little edgy, Not afraid to fight or argue, Creative (Writer/Artist), Sometimes unpredictable
Eun-byul can recall with perfect clarity, as if the memory is right in front of her, something that she saw or heard. It could be a book she read, a game of D&D, or exactly how a person looked.
When Eun-byul is corrupted, or undead, she can recall information & memorys in the form of advice from different personalities in her head. Each representing a manifestation of her memorys.

events.description: -1 HP, Eun-byul ate a fish that was highly concentrated with Mercury.
Eun started playing Dungeons & Dragons, a 4 years after it came out.
Eun-byul's doctor reports that she's had chronic exposure to mercury.
Her father gave Eun a Sony Walkman WM-D6C on her birthday.
Eun bullied a random loser, slashing their tires to prove a point about walk speeds in RPGs.
Eun left her Hunting Knife in her room.

items.name: WM-D6C Sony Walkman
items.description: A cassette hidden in her jacket. Attachments include corded headphones on her neck and a handheld microphone in her jacket. 1 C90 Tape (90m) already in the Sony Walkman, and 1 spare with mostly pirated music on it.

items.name: Journal
items.description: Journal. Discoveries, ideas, and drawings are logged here. Located in her jacket.

items.name: Purse
items.description: A zip up leather purse that holds several smaller items. Connected with a strap that Eun used to carry it on her shoulder. Has a small plush bunny keychain.

collectionItems.name: Drivers License
collectionItems.description: A small paper based New Jersey Drivers license card.

collectionItems.name: Pencil
collectionItems.description: A sharpened pencil, used for writing.

collectionItems.name: Bunny Keychain
collectionItems.description: Attached to the zipper of the purse. Depicts a cute bunny meditating with closed eyes with a carrot on a stick above it's head.

collectionItems.name: Hairspray
collectionItems.description: Travel-sized hairspray, can be used as a quick fix.

items.name: Hunting Knife
items.description: A simple pocket knife used for cutting ropes/hunting.

items.name: Pop Tires
items.description: Eun-byul can slash a car's tires to prevent it from driving.

items.name: Finger Whistle
items.description: Create a loud 120db finger whistle to attract attention.

items.name: Record Audio
items.description: Record a sample of audio and save it to a track.

items.name: Play Music
items.description: Listen to your playlist and ignore sounds from your environment.

items.name: Eye Poke
items.description: Throw a sharp object at an undead demons eye.

collectionItems.name: Richard Selous
collectionItems.description: Your father is a local journalist in Blackwood. He is an Anglican Christian and was a field journalist during the Vietnam War. His ancestor is Frederick Selous.

collectionItems.name: Mother
collectionItems.description: Your mother follows some Seon Buddhist teachings (Zen Buddhism). She is from South Korea and has always been protective over you.

collectionItems.name: Michael Selous
collectionItems.description: Your older brother, who enlisted in the Navy. He writes to you sometimes.

collectionItems.name: Frederick Selous
collectionItems.description: A legendary British explorer, big game hunter, and conservationist who lived in the late 19th and early 20th century. Your father often talks about him.

items.name: Mercury
items.description:
The tremors in your left hand are caused by chronic exposure to mercury. This was verified by a doctors appointment, so you know this is true.

The only exposure you can think of was the incident where you ate a fish from Onondaga Lake in New York.

Your father and brother joke that your crazy ideas come from the mercury. This only makes you upset.

items.name: Random Loser
items.description:
A kid you bullied 5 years ago. You slashed his parents tires for an entire month to see what he'd do to get to school.

It took him an hour and half to make it to school on average. You used this information to calculate walk times in d&d.

items.name: Walk Home
items.description:
Your father taught you how to whistle loudly with your hands, in case you ever needed to walk home by yourself. After some practice, you managed to perfect it to 120 decibals.

You had to use this ability frequently. Sometimes for hide and seek, other times when you got lost. And of course, on the walk home.
